definitions.text: extend in one or more directions
become larger in size or volume or quantity
make bigger or wider in size, volume, or quantity
examples: expand the house by adding another wing
The deer population in this town is thriving

definitions.text: add details, as to an account or idea; clarify the meaning of and discourse in a learned way, usually in writing
examples: She elaborated on the main ideas in her dissertation
The King extended his rule to the Eastern part of the continent
